column1: Smoque BBQ////Even on a snowy cold day
column2: this place was busy so I can only imagine what it's like when the weather is nice. In those instances
column3: I would order take out for sure. Although it was teeming with people
column4: the host easily found us a seat and overall
column5: the service was incredibly attentive and kind. That always wins extra points in my book.
